text:
David de Gea Quintana (born 7 November 1990) is a Spanish footballer. He plays as a goalkeeper for Manchester United and the Spain national team. Many people think he is among one of the best goalkeepers in the world.
He started playing at the senior level for Atlético Madrid in 2009. He has been playing for United since 2011 and has won a Golden Glove in the 2018/19 season during his career with them.
De Gea made his debut for the Spain national team in 2014 and played with them at the 2014 FIFA World Cup.
